main event: A pilot observed an oval-shaped object traveling at a high rate of speed near Wright-Patterson Air Force Base in Ohio on 12 August 1965.
interesting points: The object appeared to be faster than the aircraft,Capt Cannon was the only pilot aware of the sighting during the flight,The object emitted a thin black smoke or vapor trail as it passed,The sighting lasted for about 6-8 seconds,There was no physical evidence to support the sighting, and it was eventually attributed to a mirage.
location: Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, USA
witness description: Capt Cannon (instructor pilot) and Capt Wilkinson (pilot in training), only Capt Cannon was aware during the sighting.
